nodes.text: Ralia Lok was a female Mandalorian of Clan Lok living during the Galactic War. At some point during the Eternal Empire conquest she fought against the Skytroopers of the Eternal Empire alongside her clan brothers Droga Lok and Artus Lok, the current Mand'alor. When Skytroopers surrounded her team, Artus broke their ranks and ordered his warriors to retreat. Ralia and Droga witnessed as skytroopers swarmed Artus, who eventually fell while fighting them.
Ralia Lok is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire in the codex entry obtained during Chapter 14: Mandalore the Avenger.
